alert.note: Alert for New York (Manhattan) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 25 at 5:49AM EDT until September 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, New York (Manhattan) County. * WHEN...From 4 PM EDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline during the time of high tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized minor coastal flooding possible again on Tuesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.5 FT, MAJOR 9.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/05 AM 5.5/ 6.0 0.0/ 0.5 0.8/ 1.3 1 NONE 25/05 PM 7.2/ 7.7 1.7/ 2.2 1.4/ 1.9 1 MINOR 26/06 AM 6.9/ 7.4 1.4/ 1.9 1.8/ 2.2 1 NONE 26/06 PM 7.5/ 8.0 2.0/ 2.5 1.4/ 1.9 1 MINOR 27/07 AM 6.5/ 7.0 1.0/ 1.5 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 27/07 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.5/ 2.0 0.7/ 1.1 1 MINOR NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.0 FT, MODERATE 8.3 FT, MAJOR 9.4 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 3.2 FT, MAJOR 4.3 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/05 AM 5.2/ 5.7 0.1/ 0.6 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 25/06 PM 6.8/ 7.3 1.7/ 2.2 1.6/ 2.0 1 MINOR 26/06 AM 6.4/ 6.9 1.3/ 1.8 1.7/ 2.2 1 NONE 26/06 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.9/ 2.3 1.4/ 1.9 1 MINOR 27/07 AM 6.1/ 6.6 1.0/ 1.5 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 27/07 PM 6.6/ 7.1 1.5/ 2.0 0.8/ 1.3 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
